title: A Peak Behind the NHL Curtain
description:
Welcome back to another episode of In The Crease! Linda and Emily start off this episode with a few behind the scenes stories from their time in Seattle... including a very special shoutout from WNBA's Sue Bird. Then, they preview their "game of the week" before sharing some news and notes around the league from some of the teams who need some fixing.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Linda Cohn, Emily Kaplan
itunes:subtitle: Linda and Emily share stories from their broadcast in Seattle and then welcome a special guest!
